name: Flappy Bird 3D (Namansemalti4u)
description:
Flappy Bird 3d is a Hyper Causal  Endless Runner game set in a village.

I bet, you all might have played the original Flappy Bird, which was  set in a 2D world. But what, if we imagine that game in a 3D World.  It would be an awesome experience for you all.

 Here, I come with the 3D version of flappy bird named as Flappy Bird 3D.  This Arcade game is of endless runner type. That means you all can play it for hours and hours if you don't lose!! While flying your bird, you will see Coins in your path,  you can collect them, and can use them to buy different types of birds.

This game is in Development stage right now, therefore we are planning to add Powerups and many more things in future updates. The delay of future updates depends upon you. The more download this game will get, fast the update will come.

So, share it with your friends and let them have a 3D experience!!

Special Thanks to

Manish Chakradhari as 3D Artist : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjjT5zdNOpsJocmt2e-XbhQ

If you want 3D models of birds used in this game, you can visit : www.artstation.com/manishchakradhari7

Take a look on my YouTube Channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIhFamrZUBLUtvsVEbd8QVw
